entries.title_d: The Debris Cultist have gotten it into their heads that the Yavin 4 Mining Company is in charge of the salvage operation underway in the system. The company wants to have their numbers reduced in order to increase the security of their operations.
entries.title: Yavin System: Deathstar Debris Cult Destroy Duty
entries.taunt_4: I have some material I would have liked to give you, but I am afraid I must kill you instead.
entries.taunt_2: Faith in the great fireball is the only true faith.
entries.taunt_1: And he said unto me...destroy the disbelievers.
entries.quest_location_d: Cult members are all over the system causing trouble for whoever they come across. Hot spots of cult activity will be sent to your nav computer.
entries.quest_destroy_d: Destroy any of the Debris Cultists that decide to attack you.
entries.level_increase: Watch yourself. The cultists know what you are up to and will do everything they can to stop you.
entries.level_boss_dead: Yes! Without their leaders the cultists will have a harder time recruiting new members. Keep it up.
entries.level_boss: Be on the look out. The cultists have sent a %TO after you. I have heard they are bad customers.
entries.found_loc: We have found another location where the cultists are gathering. Break them up.
entries.dd_boss_taunt_5: Close your eyes, my child. I shall free you of your mortal coil.
entries.dd_boss_taunt_4: I will show you the way to ultimate peace.
entries.dd_boss_taunt_3: I find your lack of faith to be most displeasing.
entries.dd_boss_taunt_2: You should have joined with us my child. Now you will become one with the debris.
entries.dd_boss_taunt_1: And it is written that I shall destroy you.
entries.complete: Good work out there, pilot. That will really cut down on the number of crazies flying around this system. Report back to the station.
entries.boss_detected: We have picked up a vessel signature of one of their priests. He is heading your way.
